title: Wedgewood Common- Two bedroom townhouse
posting_body: Nestled just minutes from the Village of West Concord and the commuter rail, Wedgewood Common offers large one, two and three-bedroom townhouse apartments.
Each townhouse hosts fully applianced kitchens with energy efficient stoves, dishwashers, refrigerators and built-in microwaves.
Each home has a balcony which is great for entertaining!
The finished lower level makes a great office or family room.
Washer/dryer connections, central AC and assigned parking, garage parking is available.
Water, sewer, trash, landscaping and snow removal included in the rent.
Easy walk to charming West Concord shops, eateries and commuter rail to Boston.
Located in picturesque and historic Concord.
Easy commute - minutes to Rt. 2, Rt. 128 and Rt. 495.
Nearby towns: Lexington, Acton, Bedford, Lincoln, Sudbury, Wayland, Waltham, Westford.
One bedroom: Starting at $2,150 per month *NOT AVAILABLE*
Three bedrooms: Starting at $3,000 per month *NOT AVAILABLE*
Two bedrooms: Staring at $2,600 per month *READY SEPTEMBER 16TH*
$2,600 per month for a minimum of a 12-month lease.
$3,000 per month for a minimum of a 9-month lease.
No pets.
No smoking.
Qualification Standards:
Good credit & clean criminal background.
Minimum net income: $94,546 per year on a 12-month lease (not applicable for section 8 applicants).
Good references.
This apartment is presently occupied.
Therefore, we are not showing it at this time.
All interested parties must email their full name, names of all other occupants, and phone number for more information on the first available day of showing.
*Pictures and floor plan are of a sample unit and should be used as an example only*
